SongLyrics.JpnStr: 全[ぜん]部[ぶ]天[てん]気[き]のせいでいいよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: It's okay to blame it all on the weather

SongLyrics.JpnStr: この気[き]まずさも倦怠感[けんたいかん]も
SongLyrics.EngStr: This awkwardness and fatigue too

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 太陽[たいよう]は隠[かく]れながら知[し]らんぷり
SongLyrics.EngStr: The sun hides and pretends not to know

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ガタゴト揺[ゆ]れる満員電車[まんいんでんしゃ]
SongLyrics.EngStr: The crowded train shakes and rattles

SongLyrics.JpnStr: すれ違[ちが]うのは準急[じゅんきゅう]列車[れっしゃ]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Passing by the semi-express train

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 輪郭[りんかく]のない雲[くも]の 表情[ひょうじょう]を探[さが]してみる
SongLyrics.EngStr: I try to find expressions in the formless clouds

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 「作者[さくしゃ]の気持[きも]ちを答[こた]えなさい」
SongLyrics.EngStr: "Answer the author's feelings"

SongLyrics.JpnStr: いったいなにが 正解[せいかい]なんだい?
SongLyrics.EngStr: What exactly is the right answer?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 予定[よてい]調和[ちょうわ]の シナリオ踏[ふ]み抜[ぬ]いて
SongLyrics.EngStr: Stepping out of the planned harmony scenario

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 青[あお]い春[はる]なんてもんは
SongLyrics.EngStr: That thing called youth

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]には似合[にあ]わないんだ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Doesn't suit me

SongLyrics.JpnStr: それでも知[し]ってるから 一度[いちど]しかない瞬間[しゅんかん]は
SongLyrics.EngStr: But I know that the moment that only happens once

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 儚[はかな]さを孕[はら]んでる
SongLyrics.EngStr: Is filled with fleetingness

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 絶対[ぜったい]忘[わす]れてやらないよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'll definitely never forget it

SongLyrics.JpnStr: いつか死[し]ぬまで何回[なんかい]だって
SongLyrics.EngStr: As many times as it takes until I die

SongLyrics.JpnStr: こんなこともあったって 笑[わら]ってやんのさ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'll laugh even about things like this

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 狭[せま]い教室[きょうしつ] 真空[しんくう]状態[じょうたい]
SongLyrics.EngStr: The narrow classroom, in a vacuum state

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 少年[しょうねん]たちは青春[せいしゅん]全開[ぜんかい]
SongLyrics.EngStr: The boys are in full bloom of youth

SongLyrics.JpnStr: キリトリ線[せん]で区切[くぎ]れた僕[ぼく]の世界[せかい]
SongLyrics.EngStr: My world, cut off by perforation lines

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 嫌[きら]いな僕[ぼく]の劣等感[れっとうかん]と
SongLyrics.EngStr: The inferiority complex I hate

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 他人[たにん]と違[ちが]う優越感[ゆうえつかん]と
SongLyrics.EngStr: And the superiority complex different from others

SongLyrics.JpnStr: せめぎあう絶妙[ぜつみょう]な感情[かんじょう]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Conflicting with exquisite emotions

SongLyrics.JpnStr: いったい なにやってんだ
SongLyrics.EngStr: What exactly am I doing?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 「わかるわかる、同[おな]じ気持[きも]ちさ」
SongLyrics.EngStr: "I understand, I feel the same"

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ホントにそう思[おも]っていますか?
SongLyrics.EngStr: Do you really think so?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: たじろぐ僕[ぼく]の気[き]も知[し]らないで
SongLyrics.EngStr: Without knowing my hesitant feelings

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 誰[だれ]かが始[はじ]める今日[きょう]は
SongLyrics.EngStr: Today someone starts

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]には終[お]わりの今日[きょう]さ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Is the end for me

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 繰[く]り返[かえ]す足踏[あしぶ]みに 未来[みらい]からの呼[よ]び声[ごえ]が
SongLyrics.EngStr: In the repeated stomping, the voice calling from the future

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 響[ひび]いてる 「進[すす]めよ」と
SongLyrics.EngStr: Resonates, "Move forward"

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 運命[うんめい]や奇跡[きせき]なんてものは
SongLyrics.EngStr: Fate and miracles

SongLyrics.JpnStr: きっと僕[ぼく]には勿[もっ]体[たい]ないや
SongLyrics.EngStr: Surely are too good for me

SongLyrics.JpnStr: なんとなくの一歩[いっぽ]を 踏[ふ]み出[だ]すだけさ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'll just take a step somehow

SongLyrics.JpnStr: オトナほどクサってもいなくて
SongLyrics.EngStr: Not as rotten as adults

SongLyrics.JpnStr: コドモほど天才[てんさい]じゃないが
SongLyrics.EngStr: Nor as genius as kids

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]は今[いま] 人生[じんせい]の中間[ちゅうかん]だ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I am now in the middle of life

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 風[かぜ]においてかれそうで
SongLyrics.EngStr: It feels like I'll be left behind by the wind

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 必死[ひっし]に喰[く]らいついてる
SongLyrics.EngStr: Desperately clinging on

SongLyrics.JpnStr: いつもの鐘[かね]の音[ね]も 窓際[まどぎわ]に積[つ]んだ埃[ほこり]も
SongLyrics.EngStr: The usual bell sound, the dust piled up by the window

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 教室[きょうしつ]の匂[にお]いだって
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even the smell of the classroom

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 絶対[ぜったい]忘[わす]れてやらないよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'll definitely never forget it

SongLyrics.JpnStr: いつか死[し]ぬまで何回[なんかい]だって
SongLyrics.EngStr: As many times as it takes until I die

SongLyrics.JpnStr: こんなこともあったって 笑[わら]ってやんのさ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'll laugh even about things like this

ListVocab: 勿体ない-もったいない
予定調和-よていちょうわ
喰らいつく-くらいつく
満員電車-まんいんでんしゃ
